Crimes.Dispute_Type: Access to personal information under the Privacy Act

Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Protection of ongoing investigations and third-party privacy
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process followed as per Privacy Act procedures
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant alleged malice but no findings made

Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Court reviewed withheld information in camera
